title: Google\Cloud\Build\V1\PushFilter
name: PushFilter
description:
Push contains filter properties for matching GitHub git pushes.

Generated from protobuf message google.devtools.cloudbuild.v1.PushFilter

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.branch
params.description: Regexes matching branches to build. The syntax of the regular expressions accepted is the syntax accepted by RE2 and described at https://github.com/google/re2/wiki/Syntax

params.name: data.tag
params.description: Regexes matching tags to build. The syntax of the regular expressions accepted is the syntax accepted by RE2 and described at https://github.com/google/re2/wiki/Syntax

params.name: data.invert_regex
params.description: When true, only trigger a build if the revision regex does NOT match the git_ref regex.
